description: Small footlockers line both sides of the corridor, some of them having been accidently left opened.  The faint smell of smoke and ozone lingers in the hallway like a stain on the air.  Scraps of parchment drift lazily along the black-speckled white tiles of the floor.

Small footlockers line both sides of the corridor, some of them having been accidently left opened.  The faint smell of smoke and ozone drifts out from one of the classrooms.  Children dot the hallway here and there, some talking in groups while others are running off to their next class.
title: [Schoolhouse, Hallway]
